GSD.description:
video: fbdev: cirrusfb: check pixclock to avoid divide by zero

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.2 by commit e498b504f8c81b07efab9febf8503448de4dc9cf. For more details please see the references link.
